pages.text: As you may or may not know, since People's Republic & People's Republic are my testing servers, there is a lot of new and untested features among other things. That being said, one of the features being altered $(italic)frequently$() are the advancements and quests.$(br2)The quests in the quest book are triggered through advancements. If I change advancements through the
modpack's datapack on the servers before they are publicly released, your advancements and quests may no longer be cohesive and will potentially be out of sync. Please keep this in mind.
